mapper.insert: insert into notice(admin_id, title, content) values (#{adminId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select:
select notice_id as noticeId, admin_id as adminId, title, content, hit, register_time as registerTime from notice
order by notice_id limit #{start}, #{interval}
mapper.update: update notice set admin_id=#{adminId}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, hit=#{hit}, register_time=#{registerTime} where notice_id = #{noticeId}
